name: num::flt2dec::round_up

ops::index::IndexMut::index_mut.doc:
Performs the mutable indexing (`container[index]`) operation.

 # Panics

 May panic if the index is out of bounds.

option::Option: Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 47, kind: RigidTy(Uint(Usize)) })])

doc:
When `d` contains decimal digits, increase the last digit and propagate carry.
 Returns a next digit when it causes the length to change.
